title: Boris Johnson – 2020 Statement on the Birthday of the NHS
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, on 5 July 2020.
content:
This year has seen the NHS gallantly respond to the greatest challenge it has ever faced and rightly receive unprecedented support.
